content: As we live in 21st century, we can't deny that TV platforms will be going nowhere. Netflix is here to stay. I used to dream about what if the number of hours we spend watching a particular show would be converted into something that is valuable that can be converted to fiat currency. Well, this is not a dream anymore. Below I will discuss what Script Network has to offer and decide for yourself if it’s worth looking into.With television progressively turning into a cord-cutting, digital experience, script.tv is focused on delivering a unique, industry-defining experience, using blockchain technology. Although there are multiple options to consume content globally, script tv is the first to bring live television to the blockchain. With on-chain rewards through NFTs, gifts, and tokens by watching content every hour.A watch-to-earn live tv platform, built to reward users whilst they watch, through tokens, experiences and off chain rewards. Script Network is built on Script Blockchain, a video optimised chain with numerous dApps already being built, including a video first NFT marketplace for empowering content creators and fractionalising videos to their followers. Experienced team with 10+ years of experience in media, content and finance. Wider team purpose built to handle marketing, development and growth within the network long term. Some points •Founding team has built two 8 figure online companies in the past. •Full fledged team with decades of experience across all key aspects of the business from socials, marketing development and content. • 10+ experience in the technology field working with many largest banks, and commerce brands •Deep crypto and media experience from the last 5-7 years, working with studios, artists, and projects within crypto.Token metrics: Seed round: $0.01, 5% at TGE, followed by a 3 month cliff then linear vesting for 18 months starting from day 3 Strategic round: $0.0150, 8% at TGE, followed by a 2 month cliff then linear vesting for 14 months starting from day 5 Private round: $0.0200, 10% at TGE, followed by a 1 month cliff then linear vesting for 12 months starting from day 10 Public: $0.025, 25% at TGE, followed by 2 week cliff then weekly linear vesting for 4 months starting from day 1 Max Raise: $2,165,000 Initial Market Cap: $870,500 (excluding initial liquidity)
